content:
Hello Sushi world...

I am forever thankful for all the guidance on how to profile and et al. I am seeking guidance on a good guide and example how to write a IG which pulls my workflow diagrams, etc together with potential descriptive content in it apart from the TOC content SUSHI cooks up? I am looking to properly document my HOME page of SUSHI output.

Thanks
Muthu
They are largely embedded in a word doc, usually drawn using Visio or draw.io
Draw.io can do several types of diagrams, as well as word...what kind of diagrams do you mean by workflow diagrams?

Flow charts, data flow diagrams, business process diagrams and the like. I would like to write a documentation on what are the various business entities we intend to support through FHIR, how they are connected and how to interact with them. For example, Order to Reports workflow.
you can always add them as images in your pages, as with any markdown.
